definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
monkey/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
surname Wang
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to reign over

sentences.english: The Monkey King is my favorite character.
In fact, why haven't I ever heard of the Monkey King?
sentences.chinese: 事实上，为什么我从未听过美猴王？

sentences.english: Without giving it any further thought, the obedient subjects followed their king's orders.
sentences.chinese: 没有多想一想，顺从的猴子们遵循了猴王的指示。

sentences.english: The Monkey King has the children of China for many years.
sentences.chinese: 多年来美猴王已使中国的儿童振奋不已。

sentences.english: I wish I could fly like the Monkey King.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我可以像美猴王一样飞。

sentences.english: The Monkey King is a cartoon character who causes problems in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 美猴王是一个卡通角色，他在天庭上制造了很多麻烦。

sentences.english: From a distance, the monkey king saw the water demon carrying the flowers and following the prince.
sentences.chinese: 老猴王远远地看见水妖驼着花跟在王子身后。

sentences.english: ' And his answer was: 'When you become the Monkey King, you can see me.
sentences.chinese: 二哥答道，“你当上美猴王的那天，就能见到我了。”

sentences.english: In the end, the Monkey King got the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 最终猴王到达天堂般神圣的地方。

sentences.english: OK, then I'll dress up as Monkey King.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，那么我将打扮成美猴王。

sentences.english: Among them the Monkey King would be the best one.
sentences.chinese: 在它们当中猴王将会是最好的一个。

sentences.english: In the distance troops of red colobus gave honk calls, and crowned monkeys made their throaty booms.
sentences.chinese: 远处一群红疣猴叫了起来，猴王发出嘶哑的鸣叫。

sentences.english: The stone monkey called himself the Handsome Monkey King.
sentences.chinese: 这石头猴子称呼它自己叫做美猴王。

sentences.english: The Monkey King is from a 16th Century fantasy epic by Wu Cheng En.
sentences.chinese: 猴王是16世纪吴承恩写的一部神话传奇。

sentences.english: The Monkey King' is an extraordinary tale with a strange twist at the end.
sentences.chinese: 美猴王是个离奇的传说，结尾有意想不到的波折。

definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
Erlangshen, Chinese deity
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
Gyuumao
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Mount Huaguo in Jiangsu, featured in 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4], tourist destination/(also the name of mountains in other parts of China)
golden cudgel, weapon wielded by Sun Wukong in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 You2 Ji4]
little devil
monkey
monkey/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
monkey/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
great sage/mahatma/king/emperor/outstanding personage/Buddha
the eight precepts (Buddhism)
